website_summaries.verdict: If you need candelabra bulbs in a globe design, these are acceptable, but be aware of potential flickering/buzzing issues.
pros: Unique globe shape complements numerous lights, especially bedroom and bathroom fixtures
cons: For example, they may flicker, buzz, or burn out faster than expected

customer_reviews.title: Note that these bulbs are Daylight White, not Soft White!
customer_reviews.text: They arrived quickly, in a cute little box. I was pleased with them, especially because of the value. My only problem was I wish I'd ordered Soft White, instead of Daylight! Oops! This was my mistake though, not a fault of the product, so I'm still giving it 5 stars. I'm planning to return them, but I'm going to buy the same bulbs in Soft White, and I'm sure I'll be happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and bright daylight LED bulb!
customer_reviews.text: The JCase LED Globe Light Bulbs Candelabra Base, 5W (40W Incandescent Equivalent 4000K) are fantastic. They are much brighter than any 40W I have ever used so it took only two of these (at the top of either side of our bathroom mirror) to make a huge difference in our master bathroom. These are very bright white (daylight) bulbs so instead of using more of them in the fixture, we added four of the warm white Albrillo 40W bulbs and the lighting is perfect. After a week of use they are performing just fine but I will update this review in case anything happens.
customer_reviews.author: The Admiral

customer_reviews.title: perfect size, cool to touch after being on for ...
customer_reviews.text: Edited After just 6 months I have gone through all 6 and my fan only holds 3 at a time. The first 3 were great. When one blew I thought it was odd but I changed it thinking it might have been a dud. When I replaced it the light was warm and exactly what I was trying to get away from but I just let it be. A month or so later another blew so I changed it and to my disappointment it was yellow again. As of today 4/6 have blow. Wont buy from this company again. Bright, perfect size, cool to touch after being on for hours. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: UnsinkableMommy

customer_reviews.title: Lights Strobe
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive these lights as I have slowly started to shift all of the lights in my home from a yellow light to a more "natural" daylight color, and these LED bulbs seemed perfect. Unfortunately, when I installed them and turned on the fan light kit I added them to, the bulbs all started to flicker/strobe. I had to remove two of the four lights to stop the flicker from happening, which was really not what I was hoping for. The color is great, the actual usefulness however, is not.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Burn't out after 3 days
customer_reviews.text: One of the 6 bulbs in the set died after only 3 days. The other issue I have with this bulb is the color. The color does not seem 4000k, I believe they are closer to 6000k. I put them in the bathroom vanity and the 6 bulbs are so white and bright it snow blinds me for a second when I first turn them on.
customer_reviews.author: daghostmon

customer_reviews.title: Super white, bright lights for your ceiling fans
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these light bulbs to replace all of the bulbs in our ceiling fans through out the house. What a difference! The kitchen and dining room areas are so well lit! We actually have another light in the kitchen above the sink that we haven't used since we installed these lights in the ceiling fan. Fair warning though; these are really, REALLY bright white lights. Will definitely purchase these again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: momi808

customer_reviews.title: Burnt out in a year...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a year ago. Loved them. The lighting was great and they looked nice. Last week, one started flickering and then burnt out. Thought it was a fluke, but then 2 days later, another started flickering and burnt out. Right now, a 3rd one is starting to flicker so now I have to replace them all with different bulbs. Even if I had these lights on 24 hours a day(which I don't), they shouldn't be burning out at this point. I've had regular bulbs last longer. Very disappointed and won't be buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: SheriZ74

customer_reviews.title: How can something be so bright and dark at the same time?
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand how a set of lights can be so bright and dark at the same time. I had a different ceiling fan at my last place before I moved here, and I loved the daylight lights. I’ve used these for several months, but they don’t give off the best light. It’s hard to describe, but while they are bright, they make reading or writing by the light difficult because they seem to have shadows or glares off of paper at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control Based on Other Reviews
customer_reviews.text: One of the bulbs burnt out within an hour of installation. The bulb was extremely hot, far more than any LED bulb should ever be. There are a lot of 1 star reviews and now I know why, it really is a dice shoot on if you will get 6 working bulbs in the pack. ---Update--- Contacted company and they immediately sent me a replacement bulb. All other bulbs have performed well so upgrading my review ---Update--- All 6 of the original bulbs have now failed less than a year after purchase. Dropping my review back down based on poor lifetime. On the positive note, the bulb I received as a replacement is still working
customer_reviews.author: Edward R Vaughn III

customer_reviews.title: They started to fail in less 28 days
customer_reviews.text: Bought LED light bulbs so I wouldnt have to keep changing them so often but its only been 3 weeks and I'm having to swap one out for an old incandescent bulb. Good thing i saved some of the old ones. They would be nice if they lasted as long as there supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: davethewelder

customer_reviews.title: A real morning eye opener !!!
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs arrived as scheduled and in very good condition. We replaced the 5 25 watt incandescent bulbs in our bathroom light fixture with these. Switching to these LED bulbs will reduce our electric bill and using 'daylight' instead of soft white made the room much brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Onthe Banks

customer_reviews.title: LED is the Way to Be
customer_reviews.text: Fast service because of Amazon Prime. Was worried that the 40 w bulbs would be too bright (using 4), but that was not the case. Love LED bulbs and have switched over most of my home lights with them. To me Natural Daylight is the way to go. Tired of seeing everything with a yellow tint. So far I am pleased with these JCase bulbs. Buying the 6 pack allowed me to have two backup lights, being they all are LED, not sure when I will need one. Wish the price was a little lower.
customer_reviews.author: Retired CSM

customer_reviews.title: Good bulbs, but blue-white light
customer_reviews.text: These are the right bulb size and give a good amount of light. The reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is that the old bulbs were a yellow-white light and the new bulbs are a starker blue-white light that adds a harshness to our bathroom that is somewhat unpleasant, especially in the middle of the night when I'm trying to stay asleep. Interpretation - when I need to go to the bathroom in the middle of the night and need a light for any reason the light from these bulbs wakes me up fully.
customer_reviews.author: RDW

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: I was really pleased to find these led lights with a candalabra base. They definitely work well to light up my bathroom, they are VERY bright. They also don’t heat my bathroom up like the incandescent ones do and really helped cool my bathroom off this summer. I have lost one bulb after only a couple of months, but purchased extra just in case. All in all I am pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R

customer_reviews.title: Clear very bright light
customer_reviews.text: I have a bedroom ceiling fan/lamp, and the 4 bulbs that were in there were clear glass. They cast a yellow light. When 2 of the bulbs burned out, I ordered these light bulbs. They cast a MUCH brighter light than the old bulbs, and the light is white, making me realize how dingy yellow the other bulbs were. I hope the old bulbs burn out soon, so I can replace them!
customer_reviews.author: Rabid Mongoose

customer_reviews.title: Great lights and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. The bright white is so much better in my foyer fixture. Also impressed with the seller. After using these bulbs to replace my existing bulbs, one of the lights popped when I turned on the switch and would not light. I immediately emailed the seller, explained the problem and had a replacement bulb mailed to me within the week! Highly recommend bulbs and very impressed with level of customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Lightning Gal

customer_reviews.title: Lasts less than one year consistently.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of these bulbs about a month apart. They are cool to the touch and have a pleasant white color and brightness. I started losing bulbs about 9 months in. Of the 8 I've out into use, two have failed and I can see a third one is about to go. Spend the extra cash and get a reliable long lasting bulb from a reputable company. These are junk. Update: 12/9/18 More failing. Of the 12 I purchased, I now have only 3 still working. Terrible quality product. You are wasting your money with these.
customer_reviews.author: Jum

customer_reviews.title: Burned Out Quickly
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way these lit up my bathroom, but they started burning out about a year after I bought them and now they are all gone - 1-1/2 years later. Only two people in the household, we are very energy conscious so these lights are hardly ever on. Similar to many other reviews. LED lights are supposed to be so long-lived but these are not.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie M.

customer_reviews.title: E12 base lights
customer_reviews.text: I have had a hard time finding lamps with this small base to work very long. I use four of these in my fan light. These seem better than previous brand. The first lamp went out after seven weeks. The others are still working for a little over three months now. I contacted the company and they sent me two lamps to replace. I do love the bright day light look of these bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: Dimmable not good. Light they give is nice.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for the fact they were dimmable. I was very disappointed as they do not dim well at all. I was going to try and send them back it was going to cost about $7. So I decided to buy adapters (for that $7) so I could use in regular size sockers. I am using them in my bathroom bar fixtures with 8 bulbs. I have to say I really do like these for that. So, I would not advise purchasing for the dimmable feature. Another other purpose I believe you will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Don't use in a remote controlled ceiling fan light - they will flicker.
customer_reviews.text: 3 are installed in a ceiling Fan/Lamp with electronic light remote control (non-dimming, but solid-state), and these flicker intermittently. Other than that these would have been nice. I ended up with some "dimmable" Eco-smart LED bulbs from Home Depot - the light cast is not as nice, and they seem to have some 60hz modulation on the light, but they don't flicker on and off constantly like these.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Lifespan TOO Short!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a little over a year ago for our master bath. I only needed 4 so I thought a six pack would last a long time since they were LED's. I really liked the light from these bulbs, but over 15 months 3 had died. Quite a disappointment and the incandescent lights I had previously lasted longer than that. I recommend you get another brand than these.
customer_reviews.author: UNCTarheel77

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these lights to replace the incandescent lights in two old strip light fixtures in the bathroom. The fixtures use 4 bulbs each, but the package only has 6 lights. However these lights, which are 40w equivalent, were bright enough so that only 3 lights provided more light than the old bulbs. These suit our needs just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpa

customer_reviews.title: Wow these things are blinding
customer_reviews.text: Bulbs are okay just extremely bright and being LED, pretty artificial. Probably not the best for a 4 bulb bath vanity mirror. One bulb is more than plenty! Works okay in our 4 light ceiling fan. But again, just way too bright. Feels like I need sunglasses 😆
customer_reviews.author: M. D. Cohn

customer_reviews.title: Strobe lights
customer_reviews.text: One of my bulbs started flickering like a strobe light after about a year. I tried putting it in a different fixture but the problem persists. Now it's been two years and a second bulb has started flickering in the same way. They are not connected to a dimmer switch. Four of the bulbs are still working well.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Shomsky

customer_reviews.title: LED Daylight Bulbs are Great!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using only environmentally friendly light bulbs for four years. The only problem with most is that it gives a warm, dimmer light. This is fine unless you are trying to read or study. Our ceiling fan uses four bulbs and at night, it was difficult to read. I saw the candelabra base, 40W equivalent bulbs and decided to give them a try. WOW, it is actually like the difference between night and day now. They give off a beautiful, environmentally friendly bright white light. Now we can see extremely well in our family room. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Linda E.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, I really didn't like the color for a bedroom though!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, but I really did not comprehend what "Daylight White" would look like. I put them into my ceiling fan in my room and really did not like how blue the light was. It made the room seem very surgical and sterile. I returned and got a warm white color which I greatly prefer. Not the manufacturer's fault, I just didn't know that that's what "daylight white" looked like.
customer_reviews.author: MotoPlanet

customer_reviews.title: These are a great find!!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the ugly Curly-que lights with these adorable LED lights today and they are terrific! I cannot believe what a different these make in how the fan looks and the lights themselves give off a very nice, natural daylight, which is my preference. I put these into 3 fans and wish I had done it years ago. The lights are very small, not large and obvious but yet not tiny like the other candelabra lights you an find in the stores. Give them a try!
customer_reviews.author: Scuba Paws

customer_reviews.title: Need Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice and very bright! I didn't give it 5 stars only because the globes are a bit smaller than the bulbs they replaced. I'm sure I'll get over that. They also have an ice cream cone shape that could be a bit awkward in some applications. A major plus is that the 5 bulbs I needed to replace the set use less energy than a single one of the bulbs it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: God Dan

customer_reviews.title: great bulbs but be careful about the shade of light you choose
customer_reviews.text: I am using these in a floor lamp with a white paper lantern shade. They are nice and bright, but I wish I had bought the ones with 3000K color temperature instead of these 4000K ones. The shade of light is more of a "cool white" than I was expecting. I got used to it soon enough, but for those of you who expect their lamps to have a tinge of reddish warmth, I would recommend going with the 3000K version of these.
customer_reviews.author: JoeVidia

customer_reviews.title: Low life span
customer_reviews.text: Lights looked good on my porch 3 socket lamp for about 16 months, then one bulb burnt out, couple months later a second and now the 3rd just went. Didn’t even get 10,000 hours and that’s giving a high estimate of 11-12 hours per day.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Bright, but more like fluorescent lights rather than daylight.
customer_reviews.text: These are plenty bright and a great price, but the quality of the light is much more similar to fluorescent bulbs rather than actual daylight as noted. Not a natural quality to the light at all. We put them in bedroom ceiling fans, but I'd find a softer light quality if I could do this over again.
customer_reviews.author: Dawggj

customer_reviews.title: Good bulb
customer_reviews.text: I use these across the top of my vanity in the bathroom. They really help light up the room and allow nice light around the mirror. They are a bit brighter than the equivalent incandescent bulb, so be ready for that. If these are not shaded, some people may find them too bright. These bulbs seem to work well for us in our space though.
customer_reviews.author: Reenie-bop

customer_reviews.title: One out of six bulbs failed in one week.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and work as intended. I amended my review from 5 to 3 stars. One out of the six bulbs failed within one week of installation. As the fixture needs six bulbs and the bulbs are sold in packages of six, I would have to purchase six additional bulbs just for the one that failed. Unless, the company sends me a free replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. EBG

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my ceiling fan. When I use regular bulbs the glass always separates from the metal screw in because the fan shakes but this one doesn't do that. I don't really know how to explian the light. Its not bluish like some LED's but it's different. The more I use it the more I like it but it takes some getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Great for bathroom!!
customer_reviews.text: These were a great replacement for my bathroom vanity fixture. The globe is a bit smaller than the traditional bulbs but the light spectrum is great. I love the crisp natural light effect it has in my windowless bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: rosiethervtr

customer_reviews.title: Garbage - Very Early Failure
customer_reviews.text: Bought two years ago. All six have been used in the same three lamp fixture. Three have failed. Rated lifespan is 22.8 years when used an average of three hours a day. Actual lifespan, less than 2 years when used an average of one hour a day. Pure junk.
customer_reviews.author: File-Card

customer_reviews.title: 5 working Bulbs from a package of 6 ????
customer_reviews.text: Bought these six bulbs for a fixture of 5 and they work really well. HOWEVER, the sixth sat idle for almost two months and was finally needed for another fixture. Screwed it in and ZIP. . . does NOT WORK! Tried it in other fixtures and confirmed it came to me not working. Now What?
customer_reviews.author: KZ Mike

customer_reviews.title: I like them, but wish for a slightly different color temperature
customer_reviews.text: I do not know longevity, and wish the color had some more yellow, but they filled the little candelabra sockets., but will add...the color temperature did very well in my sister's kitchen, so I found a home for all 6.
customer_reviews.author: hiwatt

customer_reviews.title: Big miss! Flickered heavily, absolute waste of time!
customer_reviews.text: Lights started flickering 1 day after install. Drove our family absolutely nuts! Also note these are the daylight color which has a very clean, bluish look...almost harsh to us. Returning all 3 boxes and pretty upset I had to break back out the ladder and remove and replace the old ones 15 times.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Wallace

customer_reviews.title: These look awesome in my chandelier
customer_reviews.text: These look awesome in my chandelier. When lit, only the bulb's top portion (approximately 60% of the total globe) is illuminated. They still look great. Also, the color of the light is pretty stark, kind of a blue-white. My home reflects a modern decor so the light looks great. However, if my decor was more traditional I would probably opt for a warmer hued light.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the LED lighting because it typically lasts much longer. One of these has burnt out in the same amount of time (or less!) than I was experiencing with traditional incandescent bulbs. I suppose I will keep looking for a brand that will last. :-( Plus, the light color of these is harsh. Very blue.
customer_reviews.author: homeshopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Light Coverage and Tone
customer_reviews.text: If you have more than 3 bulbs in your vanity, I would advise dropping your wattage down some because these are pretty bright. I have 2 unscrew the 2 middle of my 4 bulbs. Still happy though. LEDs are where it's at if you want to easily save some money.
customer_reviews.author: DavesNotHere

customer_reviews.title: Very bright light
customer_reviews.text: I replaced 40 watt LED soft white, 200 lm bulbs with these 450 lm bulbs. What a difference! I am using them in a kitchen ceiling fan which has 4 bulbs and now the whole room is well lit. It's amazing how bright it is! I can't comment on the longevity of these bulbs as I just recently installed them.
customer_reviews.author: Theresia C.

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome, way better than the traditional bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome, way better than the traditional bulbs. I found LED vanity bulbs were very hard to find in stores so I was pleased to find them on amazon. They're definitely bright and daylight quality which is great for putting on makeup.
customer_reviews.author: gina nota

customer_reviews.title: Safe and bright!
customer_reviews.text: These little bulbs were used to replace the awful, yellow-toned, glass bulbs that were in the flush-mounted lights in our new home. They made a huge difference! They are bright and the perfect color, not too blue or too yellow. They are very cool to the touch and they are like a plastic sort of material so if you drop them (like I did a few times) they don’t shatter everywhere! Great price and a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Awoodall

customer_reviews.title: These do not last
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine initially, but started failing in six months. All failed within the first year and had to be replaced. The extra cost of LED lights is easy to justify because they are projected to last much longer than conventional bulbs. Didn't pan out on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Klopfenstein

customer_reviews.title: Great Lights!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these lights! They are bright and light up my bathroom as incandescent bulbs cannot. I just ordered two more sets for my upstairs bathroom. I purchased the 40 watt chandelier bulbs. Plus, they look great in my light sockets!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Good price and lighting ... only last a year + 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed to have purchased LED bulbs that last just long enough to expire the warranty. I was hoping they would last several years for the price, being LED and boasting "Over 15,000hrs lifespan". I would NOT suggest purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: These LED bulbs are worthless and not as good as the original Incandescent I replaced them with
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these light bulbs on January 28, 2017 from Amazon. They are LED lightbulbs. Today is February 24, 2018 ( a bit over 1-year). Today is the day the 4th LED lightbulb died. These LED bulbs are worthless and not as good as the original Incandescent I replaced them with. My recommendation is to find another manufacturer for the LED bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Great for ceiling fans
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace the bulbs in my kitchen ceiling fan. It’s not always easy to find candelabra base bulbs that give enough light, but these really do. They were compatible with the existing bulbs and give a much brighter light.
customer_reviews.author: barmala

customer_reviews.title: Short Life
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a bathroom light and after 18 months, half of them are already burned out. That's only about 3000 hours, no where near the 30,000 hours advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Wayner

customer_reviews.title: Too blue
customer_reviews.text: These were the right size bulbs for our Harbor Breeze ceiling fan, however we have many 4000K bulbs throughout our home but these cast a light that looked much closer to 5000K. Too blue for us, will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: McQ

customer_reviews.title: They're nice but they look closer to a 5000K color though ...
customer_reviews.text: They're nice but they look closer to a 5000K color though they're advertised as 4000K. They have a bit of a cold feel to them. Hard to find lights that are pure white these days. Most are either soft (yellow) or cold (blue).
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: They are bright for a 40W LED
customer_reviews.text: Installed them in our bathroom fixtures replacing regular 40W bulbs. Everyone noticed the change. They are very bright. It's not a soft white. About the same bright white light as you get from the 60W equivalent LED bulbs for regular fixtures. While a bit different, and bright, there are no complaints. Instant on.
customer_reviews.author: A. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Read the description before ordering!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bulbs for my bathroom fixture, and they are way too bright. I should have ordered the bulbs with a softer light. I am debating returning the bulbs. All six of the bulbs in my package arrived unbroken and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Boo! After about 20 minutes of being on, all of my bulbs flicker. They are in regular non-dimmable ceiling fans. Regular incandescent and CFL bulbs work just fine in my fixtures. Returning for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Darius Suddreth

customer_reviews.title: Strong odor
customer_reviews.text: I could smell the chemical smell when I removed them from the box. Placed three bulbs in my bedroom ceiling fan and the electrical smell filled the entire room. I am returning this product and do not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tami N.

customer_reviews.title: Very, Very Bright!!!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped very quickly, great price. These are very bright bulbs, far brighter than the old incandescents in our ceiling fan light, almost to the point of being uncomfortably bright. Our fan lights take 4 bulbs and have clear glass shades. However, these bulbs could be perfect for your particular application.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Great until they all burned out a year later
customer_reviews.text: These are supposedly rated for 30,000 hours. I purchased in September of 2017 for my bathroom. As of October 2018, 5 of the 9 bulbs have flickered and burnt out. Even if I left my light on 24 hours a day, that's only ~9500 hours, a third of what they're rated.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Rockman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 6 pack of these back in June for a bathroom vanity. To date, 4 of them have stopped working. As LEDs go, these did not meet my expectation regarding lifespan. I would not recommend buying these. One other problem I noticed after replacing the first one was that the color was different. The older ones looked warmer, and after a few weeks, the replaced one is still a whiter light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great little lights
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 lights in the fixtures in both of my bathrooms. I used these lights to replace the incandescent lights. These lights brightened my bathroom. I did not realize how dark my lighting was. I can see clearly now.
customer_reviews.author: Truddi

customer_reviews.title: Good for bathroom vanity.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a six pack 16 months ago. Two have already burnt out. The package says "Life based on 3hrs/day- 22.8 years." I'd say they under performed.. EDIT: I was given three replacement bulbs and told I may have just gotten a faulty batch. Time will tell!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan McAlpine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit with small screw in base for many ceiling fans
customer_reviews.text: These lights fit perfect in our ceilings fans and smaller light fixtures in our bathrooms. The lumens are a bit lower than we wanted but all in all these met our expectations for led to reduce our electricity bills over time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pecoraro

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light!!!
customer_reviews.text: They seem to work great. All bulbs arrived intact. They fit the ceiling fans appropriately. My only complaint is that they are smaller than a normal light bulb & I didn't expect that. They do still give off great light in the "daylight" color, but they are much smaller than a normal light bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha M.

customer_reviews.title: Short life span
customer_reviews.text: All LED bulbs dim over time, but this should occur slowly, over a period of years. After 6 months of use three of four of these bulbs have started to dim noticeably, turning a more yellow hue, two of them almost to the point where they need replacing. Great bulbs initially but with must be serious quality issues to give them such a short lifespan.
customer_reviews.author: G Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Not worth
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in July and one is out already and they are dim now Not worth money
customer_reviews.author: Sara De

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for old incadescent
customer_reviews.text: I have older bathroom cabinet that has candelabra base. Never liked 'soft white' but didn't really want 'day light 6500k'. These LED bulbs were a good compromise.
customer_reviews.author: GGRussell

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are perfect for the ceiling fan. Nice bright, truly white light. You do t get the yellow tint of incandescents with these bulbs. The packaging was nice and sturdy too. Buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: Wu-Shock-Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good purchased
customer_reviews.text: Bulbs are fantastic! I can't believe how bright and cool. I had 11 regular bulbs in one fixture and it was HOT. I have finally replaced with all LEDs and you can feel the difference. One bulb out of the 6 did not work but exchange is in process. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: only lasted 7 months .... so much for expensive LED
customer_reviews.text: When you pay so much for LED bulbs it is supposed to have a long life tine, these lasted about 7 months and then they burnt out, what a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: akawache

customer_reviews.title: 90 Day Lifespan
customer_reviews.text: 6 pack delivered in May. It's now August and 2 bulbs have failed within a week.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged hard to find light bulbs
customer_reviews.text: We have some odd light fixtures in our hall and thought we’d have to change them out. These fit perfect. They came in a well crafted box that was so well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L.

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Sunny!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and small so they fit just about any fixture. Please note that color temperature is 4000K. That's makes it appear closer to real sunlight than your average 2700K bulb. So if the rest of the lighting in the fixture is the typical warm temperature bulb, it may not match. Moral of the story: If you are replacing just one bulb in a multi-bulb fixture, make sure it is the same color temperature as the other ones. Otherwise replace all the lamps in the fixture and you will have no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Yonatan

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and effective. I have a vanity mirror ...
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and effective. I have a vanity mirror that uses 8 bulbs. I had to use only 6 because they are so bright. My kids constantly forget this light on when they leave the bathroom so they also help in lowering my electric bill.
customer_reviews.author: Leosmary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs came in perfect condition, and they look great. The light is bright and white as I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: #1broncofan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: They are very "white" - so beware of that. If that's what you like, you'll love these. Otherwise, you may want a cooler light - 2400k or so.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: One of the bulbs did not work. 😐 it's ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW. Good product! Great company. This company found my review and took it upon themselves to fix it. I didn't ask them to fix it and they didn't ask me to change my review. I'm very impressed. " One of the bulbs did not work. 😐 it's would not have been a big deal but I needed exactly 6. Now I will have to buy another box."
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: NOT long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they are supposed to be long lasting. We used them for about 3-6 hours a day and they are already dying after only 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much better
customer_reviews.text: One of the bulbs was broken when it arrived and the light flickers a bit on the others. Not the greatest bulb for sure but it could also be the type of fan I have. It does light up the room though so it does serve it's main function. *UPDATE* so they replaced my broken bulb without me even asking them too. Can't complain when a company does business like that. Bulbs have actually been better since they've been used a bit.
customer_reviews.author: draconis15

customer_reviews.title: Bulbs Do Not Work!!
customer_reviews.text: An entire 6 pack case did not work! Very disappointed with this purchase. I purchased 2 of them. In the 2nd pack, only 2 bulbs worked.
customer_reviews.author: Grizzod

customer_reviews.title: More like 6k color temp.
customer_reviews.text: Waaaaay too blue. I have bher flat ultimate white walls and the walls looked like light blue with these.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW J HAKKO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I had recently moved into a bedroom that did not have the greatest natural light coming through the window and the lights in the ceiling fan were on their last legs. I purchased these and they are perfect! They give off a great amount of light and i love the cool tone of the bulbs! So glad I got the 6 pack!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME LITTLE BULBS
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome; nice bright white light (no yellow). Work great with my dimmer fan light ( they don't dim; straight on and off, thank goodness). And... they are the cutest little bulbs; irrelevant, but hey. Received 2 days after order. Luv them; great seller.
customer_reviews.author: sandybb

customer_reviews.title: yep, the ARE LED bulbs
customer_reviews.text: as expected replaced I think, a bazillion of the old candle shaped incandescent's, and though much LESS BRIGHT, there is much LESS heat and cost
customer_reviews.author: minigun

customer_reviews.title: Needs LED dimmer to replace old type dimmer.
customer_reviews.text: This light was exactly what I expected. The lamp was on an old type dimmer which causes a light vibration new LED dimmer in the mail. This is my first experience with non-LED dimmers.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Ceiling fan bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for bulb replacements for a celing fan. Cendelabra is not a very common size on anything else than flame looking bulbs. These fit perfectly and are bright enough.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last a year.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, but they are failing one by one shy of a year since install. Down to two out of the six bought. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Truly Natural Day Light
customer_reviews.text: If you want to bring the daylight into your room these are the bulbs for you! Love the natural bright light they bring into the room. I have them in 2 rooms and could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to change out the lightbulbs in my ceiling fan as I needed more light in my bedroom. I was very disappointed when the bulbs began to strobe and flicker. I have never had this issue before so I can only assume that it is the lightbulbs causing the issue. Don’t waste your time or money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Rinaldo

customer_reviews.title: I love daylight bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I love daylight bulbs. It is hard to find decent price daylight light bulbs for small sockets. These worked great and didn't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Provides a white light
customer_reviews.text: Bright white light output. Zero heat. Minimal energy consumption. Replaced six lights on the the bathroom vanity. The former 40w incandescent bulbs wasted most of their energy in heat production.
customer_reviews.author: Dave in Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, and work well in a "special" lamp ...
customer_reviews.text: Very bright, and work well in a "special" lamp we have in the living room. very white, not soft white. Fit well and use very little energy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: better than the old incandescent bulbs that were in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Clean, bright light, better than the old incandescent bulbs that were in the light fixture. We don't use it often, but these bulbs make a different when we do need it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Barker

customer_reviews.title: Only 4 months old in a second home we have ...
customer_reviews.text: Only 4 months old in a second home we have spent a week in and one bulb is already dead Not very cost effective !!!
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: LED Light Bulbs Candelabra Base
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for overhead fans works great I highly recommend this bulb
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Tons of Light
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by how much light these little things provide. The previous ones we used were a little too warm. These are a much brighter but cooler glow. If you don't like bright white, then these aren't for you. We are very happy at how much it changed the light in the room.
customer_reviews.author: kristaFM

customer_reviews.title: Weird color light
customer_reviews.text: These give off a weird bluish boingy light. Not natural at all. Would not but again.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. CrunchyTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: These are really bright!
customer_reviews.text: Was replacing string lights in the backyard. Turned it into a football field, that bright.
customer_reviews.author: modern seeker

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these bulbs to replace standard candelabra bulbs in our ceiling fans. They all have the globes that are beige which darkens the room in my opinion. After switching to these LED daylight bulbs, the rooms are much brighter and we can see without using a lamp or additional lighting. I will be using these bulbs only now.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry L. Randell
